entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
